faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our IPTV service
faq.answer1: Our service works on Smart TVs, Android devices, iOS devices, Windows, Mac, Firestick, Roku, MAG boxes, and more. We provide setup guides for all supported devices.
faq.answer2: No! We use premium servers and CDN networks to ensure smooth streaming without buffering. We guarantee 99.9% uptime and crystal clear quality.
faq.question3: How do I set up the service?
faq.answer3: Setup is very easy! After purchase, you'll receive detailed instructions via email and WhatsApp. Our support team is available 24/7 to help with installation.
faq.question4: Can I use multiple devices simultaneously?
faq.answer4: Yes! Most plans include multiple connections. Check your plan details for the exact number of simultaneous connections allowed.
faq.question5: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer5: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard), PayPal, and cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum). All payments are processed securely.
faq.answer6: Yes! We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied with our service, contact us within 7 days for a full refund.
